sources.title: Plane Goofy (1940)
sources.description: A fast-talking airplane-salesman inspires the farmyard animals to building airplanes of their own, but farmer Alfalfa is set on not getting off of the ground. The salesman finally gets him to take a flight, with the result that he vows never to take another one. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/plane-goofy-1940/

metadata.Plot: A fast-talking airplane-salesman inspires the farmyard animals to building airplanes of their own, but farmer Alfalfa is set on not getting off of the ground. The salesman finally gets him to take a flight, with the result that he vows never to take another one.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
